website_summaries.verdict: A quality carseat canopy at a low price.
pros: A multi-use design that can be used for a carseat cover, nursing cover, shopping cart cover, or high chair cover
cons: Easy to tear unless you remove when installing carseat to base

customer_reviews.title: It bleeds when you wash!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with copper pearl products, and I have been wanting this specific pattern for a while, I finally decided to purchase. Only problem I have is that this cover bleeds through when you wash it. I washed with similar colors and the yellow line bled through to my other clothes and now that line is all over the blanket. Is so disappointing. I was planning on ordering the little hat to go along with this but I don’t think I will anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jordeliz

customer_reviews.title: Love this as a car seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as a car seat cover! It’s great to keep wind/sun out of baby’s face (and all those strangers trying to see baby lol). I’ve tried using as a nursing cover and if you and baby are still figuring out breastfeeding, this cover is hard to use. It would be easy to use now because I’m more hands free when trying to get baby to latch. But at this point I’ve learned how to wear an under tank to cover my stomach and my breast is covered by my shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Davaun B.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the product and concept
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th cover I've ordered, 2 were gifts and 2 for my little one. I LOVE the product and concept; however I just opened this item on Saturday and by Sunday I noticed two holes in the material. This happened with the first one I purchased and Copper Pearl was very helpful and quickly replaced the item for me at no charge (and were very apologetic too) and we didn't have any issues with that particular one once replaced. Overall, its a lovely product and I'll still use it (with or without holes), just bummed about the material quality and hesitant to purchase more to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for carseat cover, not so great for nursing.
customer_reviews.text: We used this cover until our daughter was 10 months old! It seriously came in handy so many times when she was asleep in her carseat and we wanted to take her out but wanted her to have a little privacy for sleeping. It is super stretchy, washes well, and fit our car seat perfect. It was also breathable. Would recommend and would probably buy again. The ONLY thing that didn't make sense was using it as a nursing cover, my wife could never get it to fit on comfortably and didn't like it while nursing. She just put a swaddle blanket over her shoulder most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Evan V.

customer_reviews.title: Very Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I get so much more use out of this than I ever expected. It is great as a nursing cover except for the fact that it can be difficult to see the baby to adjust them while they are nursing. I've had to have my husband pull the neckline away from my body in order for me to see to reattach my daughter. I'm sure it's easier for an older baby who doesn't need help latching. It's very soft and I use it for a blanket and car seat cover all the time. I only have the one and find myself wishing I had at least 1 more. It has help up great after many washings, in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G.

customer_reviews.title: I love the material
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop touching it! I love the material. If my son is OK with being covered, then I can tell we won't get overheated, which has always been a concern of mine when nursing. Fits well around the car seat for when it's not in the car (which isn't recommended or necessary) so it will work perfectly for covering up quickly to get to and from the car. I'll definitely be sad when we won't need this anymore and I'll have to find something made from similar material to love on lol. There was no damage to the product and seems well made so it will be long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wargo

customer_reviews.title: Luxury item, looks great but I fear won't hold up terribly well
customer_reviews.text: I like that the fabric is really stretchy and lightweight. I can see that it may not hold up too well especially if you aren't careful about it getting caught between the caraway and base. Mine arrived with a light plastic smell but I intend to wash anyways so not a huge deal. Very nice aesthetically but I am not sure how it will hold up, will try to come back and update review once baby arrives and I've gotten some real life use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Watson Family

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Pretty thin material that I feel like I could've made my own. I really like it though. Have only used on my car seat for privacy and one time for nursing. I didn't like that I couldn't see my baby latch on while nursing. Better used after baby is already on since you don't have an extra hand to really open the top and look down in on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy & Dustin Doerflinger

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd purchase from copperpearl and definitely not my last! The price for the cover was great (less than website on Amazon) and the color is so cute for our anticipated little girl! A soft pinky/peach. The material is very soft. I can't say anything about durability yet, but I love that it is a 3 in one product so it will save space in the diaper bag! It also fit over our uppababy Mesa perfectly and seems very breathable and will not blow around like other covers that clip to the top. Looking forward to more cute fabrics and products!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: A great multi-use cover for your babe. Great buy. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and daughter-in-law as they made me a grandpa six weeks ago. I couldn't be more happy with this new life in my life. My d-in-law needed a cover for her car seat, carry-the-baby gadget. She looked through the many listed on Amazon and she picked this one out. I delivered it to her yesterday, April 21, 2016. She absolutely loves it. Could not contain herself. Keep the sun off the babe, it has so many uses. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: WillsReviewz

customer_reviews.title: The copper pearl cover is one of the greatest baby items
customer_reviews.text: The copper pearl cover is one of the greatest baby items! I saw a woman at babies r us with the cover & asked where she bought it. She proceeded to tell me from amazon. She said it's great, light, & you can peak right in at the baby. Well I bought one immediately and it really is the best. It beats throwing a blanket on the seat which ends up falling all over the place. You constantly have to readjust blankets as well. With the copper pearl you just peak right in and that's it. Great find. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Great material on this one, good for summer and winter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago. The second one I just bought reminded me to review this one. I love this canopy cover. The material stretches around my baby's car seat really well, and it doesn't lose its shape. It was great for the summer when her heavier cover became too hot, and it's also worked well this winter paired with a thicker sherpa bundle in the car seat to block the wind and sunlight. The material on this particular cover is perfect. Just wish they were all this good. The floral one I just ordered doesn't stretch around the car seat as well as this one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Creamer

customer_reviews.title: I like that it wraps around you and you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it mainly as a nursing cover. I like that it wraps around you and you don't have to struggle to try to keep it closed like other designs. It's lightweight and was great for breastfeeding in the summer. I also used it as a cover for my bassinet in the summer to keep the sun off my her legs. Was also handy as a car seat blanket for her, and a makeshift coat for me in cold restaurants! I've never used it as a car seat canopy- personally, I don't think it's ever a good idea to put anything over a baby and reduce oxygen levels.
customer_reviews.author: resler nina

customer_reviews.title: Love these! If you use it for any one ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! If you use it for any one of the 3 purposes, it's worth it, but even more so because it's so versatile! I carry my newborn around with the cover on EVERYWHERE and I use it to nurse as well. They are just perfect! Pros: Versatility, private/fidget free nursing cover, fun colors, easy to use and take on and off. Cons: Because the fabric is jersey and stretch, it's not very breathable. Kind of a minor complaint, but can make for a sweaty baby if you're using it as a nursing cover. Also fabric is thin so can pinch or rip in certain conditions. Bottom Line: For the price, it can't be beat! I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shin

customer_reviews.title: There are better for cheaper on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We really like the functionality. Looked great and works great. After a week or two of use small holes began to appear. It was looking more and more beat up so we decided to purchase a so.ilar product from a different brand to compare. The one made by Adorology was a little cheaper, came with 2 bibs, and is much much better.
customer_reviews.author: MosesZG

customer_reviews.title: We Really Like It
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes this carseat cover for our newborn. It is easy to use and light weight. Keep the bright light out when strolling or in/out of the vehicle. Also keeps baby girl shielded from cool AC when in the van.
customer_reviews.author: play_that_jazz

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE Copper Pearls bibs so I was excited to try the cats eat cover. Super cute but after only 3 months the stiching is coming undone and there are holes in it. I didn't want to spend the money on a Milk Snob cover, so I ordered this. However I ended up ordering a Milk Snob anyways, bc this one was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: FairReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Bought a s a highly recomended baby gift.
customer_reviews.text: When lookingfor a new born baby gift for close friends, I asked a large group of mothers what to get and they all said hands down this was the best thing you can get a new mother. They were right it is one of the most useful things they have gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for baby registry!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with these covers!! I had two on my baby registry and received them both at my shower. I wasn't sure how much I'd really use them but thought there'd be good to have just incase. Now, we never leave home without one, so I had to buy another to keep in rotation when we are washing the others. I feel so much better having this protecting my baby when we have to carry her in her car seat into places. It keeps germs hands from touching her and keeps the light out too while still being very light and breathable! It also makes a great nursing cover.
customer_reviews.author: HNshops

customer_reviews.title: Just like a similar product on Instagram, but better price tag
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this car seat cover! We've been looking for one for awhile but couldn't find any that really suited my style. Most had hideous patterns whereas I was looking for something more minimalistic and modern. While scrolling through my Instagram feed, I found and fell in love with a multi-purpose car seat cover, but I couldn't fathom spending $40 on it! I decided to search "stretchy black and white car seat cover" and lo and behold... Amazon saved the day! It looks exactly like the one I saw on Instagram but with a much better price tag. I get SO many compliments on this trendy cover!
customer_reviews.author: Chappell Four

customer_reviews.title: Very fashionable and useful product. I've used it as a scarf
customer_reviews.text: Very fashionable and useful product. I've used it as a scarf, carseat and stroller cover, and a nursing cover. It hasn't faded in the wash and I absolutley loved it. Only problem was the material is super thin and it wore a hole very quickly. Not bad for the price though. Oh and I love how when nursing my infant, I can tuck his lego in and the stretchy material will hold his legs in place so they don't dangle off my little lap.
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Plus size mom
customer_reviews.text: I am plus size (16) and was unsure if this would have enough stretch and room to nurse with. I decided to order it anyway just because I loved the look for a car seat cover. I am very happy to say that it has also worked great as nursing cover! I found the material had enough give that baby and I have plenty of room but still stay covered. Love the soft smooth texture and that unlike other covers this stays put and doesn't accidentally flash anyone :)
customer_reviews.author: L233

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied; I'm ordering a couple more
customer_reviews.text: I get a ton of compliments on this cover. The colors are great & eye-catching! The material is thin, like your favorite comfy t-shirt, which is great for warmer days when I want to keep the baby covered but don't want her to be too warm. I feel like it's breathable. Because of the type of material though, it wrinkles easily if not kept flattened out (again, think "favorite comfy t-shirt") and has a tendency to stretch. But it washes and dries so easily that it's no big deal to get it back to new condition in a short matter of time.
customer_reviews.author: JulesFink

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one option!
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this multi-use cover. It has saved me a few times when I've forgotten my other nursing cover, and realized I had this on the car seat. It gives good coverage while nursing, but is a little too hot in my opinion. I would appreciate more breathable fabrics. It provides shade for baby in the car seat or stoller, with a hole for airflow and to check on baby. I've also used it to keep out germs in the early weeks! I have recommended it to many friends as a good multi-use cover to reduce the number of items needed for outings!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: As always...Copper Pearl knows what they're doing.
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cover is a great product! I bought it just before Christmas because I didn't want to travel with my 3 week old baby while exposed to the elements but also people. This product does everything it says it does and it is also stylish. I love it. I will always buy Copper Pearl products as it never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these to give as gifts to new mothers. Although they are 5 in 1 covers, most of the recipients use them only as nursing covers. I have been told they they are the best nursing covers, because of the stretch in the fabric, which allows the mother to be covered completely, even in the back.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This cover is incredible and versatile. It's stretchy, light weight, and super easy to use. It fits our Chico carseat beautifully. I am a plus size girl and I have lots of room to breastfeed and maneuver for burping while staying completely covered. I have the thin black and white stripes cover. It doesn't block out all light but it does keep the sun out. It blocks the wind fairly well. I would say you will still want a blanket over your baby's legs in the winter but it will shield the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Alightn

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this for my first child.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I wish I had this for my first child. This beats the bib cover. My kids would swat it away exposing me, plus I would have to pull my shirt up most of the time, which left my back exposed. This cover can't be knocked away to expose you and it keeps you covered all the way around. I also love how it doubles as a carseat cover. This makes one less thing to put into your diaper bag and also helps keep you from forgetting your cover at home. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Arns Family

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They are light weight so they work ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are light weight so they work even on a hot day. I use them as a car seat cover and a nursing cover. The best part about using them as a nursing cover is that you literally have nothing exposed with no worry of the cover getting kicked or blown off, but you can still peek in and see your baby. I have even used it just to shield my baby from the sun on a hot day while I carry her. I wish I had had this with my first child, because it has made life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: SMcGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends had this exact car seat cover. I fell in love with it immediately. It keeps people from touching baby, stays tight when the wind is blowing, is multi purpose and a great quality. The only thing I wished was it came in a different color/pattern. I didn't want to order the exact same one as my friend, but thankfully she didn't mind. It's an excellent price and is one of my favorite purchases for baby so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: BB4

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cover is gorgeous! I absolutely love it. I wasn’t sure how often I would use one since I bought it when my daughter was 4 months old but I am so glad I did. She now SLEEPS in her car seat. Worth every penny for just that!
customer_reviews.author: Noelani Soroten

customer_reviews.title: Coloring is not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is super stretchy and soft which I love. But the color is off from the picture. The coloring is definitely not at vibrant and the mustard stripe looks like the ink bled onto the white when it shouldn't have. I ordered a replacement, hoping I just got a defective one but the replacement is just the same. Too bad cause it is such a darling print.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Jo Homer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't return back to original shape
customer_reviews.text: The concept is really nice however the fabric stretches out and doesn't really return to shape. After a couple uses it began to look sloppy and droopy. It stretched out to the point where it catches under the car seat when putting it in the base. This has created a few little holes. I think this product would have been perfect had the material returned to its shape. Even after washing and drying it its still stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pieritz

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to use this with my baby yet. I'm not due until next month. But I did try it out on our car seat & I love it! It stretches over perfectly & provides plenty of coverage. It's lightweight enough to use in the summertime, but still will work great in the colder months. I love that it's a multi-purpose item, it will definitely be in the diaper bag at all times & ready to use! This is a must have for all parents of infants!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bayly

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was on a friends registry so I purchased it for her baby shower. It arrived quickly and was packaged nicely. It was really soft and just what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing baby carrier cover
customer_reviews.text: Amazing baby carrier cover. Doesn't blow up in the wind, keeps the baby warm and covered, easy to peak in without disturbing the baby. Get compliments on it all the time. I've used it for a nursing cover too, which works really well. I get compliments on it whenever I'm out, asking where I got it. Purchased the Grace floral cover, which is beautiful and super girly!
customer_reviews.author: FleaBag01

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is soooo awesome!! It is lightweight so in warm weather babies don't sweat like crazy but it keeps the wind and sun off. It works so well as a nursing cover, it doesn't slip at all. Best nursing cover I have ever had. Haven't tried it yet as a cart cover because baby is still too little. My cousin jokes that it could work as a skirt in a pinch and honestly it could! It washes and dries really well also. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fal B

customer_reviews.title: and I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing nursing covers for 7 months after my baby was born, then decided to finally take the plunge because Copper Pearl was available for prime shipping, and I am so glad I did! It has been so great to have a full coverage cover to use - we've used it on planes, at Disney World, at restaurants. It helps me be super comfortable while nursing my baby. I would highly recommend! The only reason i gave 4 stars instead of 5 is the fabric is a little more see through than I would have expected, but that would be easily remedied by selecting a darker fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Gaven

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: I love this nursing cover/ car seat cover! It is light weight which is great especially for summer. The material is super soft and stretchy and covers everything. The opening is perfect to stretch over your head and easy to peek through at your little one It folds up small so you can throw it in any bag. Best baby purchase in a long time! I've had four other covers and this is by far my favorite! Can't believe I got by with my first three kids without this!
customer_reviews.author: V. Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Great multi purpose item!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughter. It arrived quickly and she loves it for her new baby. As a car seat cover it keeps the wind, leaves, bugs, etc. off the baby and allows him to sleep without being disturbed when not at home. Nice to keep others from getting too close to him during flu season. She likes it better than her other nursing cover ups. It is quality made in a light weight material and perfect for Spring and Summer. Thanks for such a great multi purpose product. I will give this item as baby gifts in the future..
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for keeping germs off our babe in public! We keep one for covering the car seat and a separate one for nursing in the diaper bag. We love that it’s multipurpose, incredibly soft and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 3-1 cover
customer_reviews.text: I received the product on next day delivery and was very pleased with it. The material is very soft and breathable and fits great on our car seat. The narrow opening is the perfect size so that when it is on the car seat it leaves just the right amount of space for air to flow through. There was a slight defect on the product but after speaking with the owner Stephanie we were able to have the issue resolved. Awesome customer satisfaction! I would highly recommend this to any nursing mother.
customer_reviews.author: noelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Our double stroller doesn't provide extra shade for the baby and this is perfect. I dont' cover up while nursing so I haven't tried it as a cover up. My lo is too little to sit in a cart, so I haven't tried that yet either. It also seems to help my baby when she falls asleep in the stroller and we need to bring her inside and want her to stay asleep - lighting changes seem not to effect her as much.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Deininger

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is easily see through
customer_reviews.text: I found the quality of the produce to be good as far as it appears visually. I did not have a chance to try this cover with a baby as my baby is not here yet. However after a couple days of feeling unsure about the product I have decided to return it as the fabric is light and breathable but easily see-through. In order to feel more comfortable when nursing my baby I have decided to return this product. I was concerned that I would have a similar experience with other styles/colors and so I have made my own instead. I will not be purchasing another cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover, it is so soft and stretchy and the coverage is far superior to any of the apron style covers. I never felt comfortable nursing in public until I got this. It also works great on restaraunt highchairs
customer_reviews.author: JoyL

customer_reviews.title: It's really cute and works great but it did start to develop holes randomly
customer_reviews.text: It's really cute and works great but it did start to develop holes randomly. Not sure what it would have caught on to create them. This was after about 3-4 months of use so not ideal. But I have heard other big names brands have the same issue so not sure what's going on. Other than durability I was happy, very soft material and lovely pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: One of the best baby products ever!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! It works amazing as a cover when breastfeeding giving full coverage, yet very comfortable. Love how it covers my baby's car seat, but I can still peep through to see him. I also like that the fabric is light weight, it seems much more "breathable" than other car seat covers. And the fabric is so soft! I haven't used it as a shopping cart cover yet, but I'm sure it will work great for that too. Love the versatility this product offers! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! I bought 3 different colors. Super soft and stretchy and great to keep the sun or wind off your baby when on walks in the stroller. Also, made me feel much better about having our newborn in public when I could cover him up so that not every person would be stopping us or looking in to see him/trying to touch him and protects him from germs at the doctors office. Super cute and easy to put on and configure as you want. Looking forward to using it as a breastfeeding cover and a shopping cart cover down the road. I plan on buying for friends for their baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ketnick

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best things we've purchased for our daughter. The fabrics perfect for breaking the wind and still being breathable. We have gotten so many compliments. I would recommend this to everyone. It's also doubled as a nursing cover. We did have 1 small hole after 9 weeks but I was able to stitch it very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Howard

customer_reviews.title: This one is exactly the same and is beautiful!! The stripes are a cream and peach ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one similar to this that I paid almost double for. This one is exactly the same and is beautiful!! The stripes are a cream and peach color. It makes my carseat look very feminine and super cute! This will be my go to gift for baby showers for everyone. It is a great multi-purpose gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: You get so much for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this nursing cover and carseat cover! I was in the market for a carseat cover when my nursing cover started failing for my growing baby! If your baby is a houdini and can get out of normal covers this is a good one! No more flashing in public places ;) Plus they are very cute! Everywhere I go I get compliments on how cute and versatile it is!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect multifunctional baby product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product already and we just started using it today. The multifunctional use is what sparked my interest along with the fun fabric pattern. I can't wait to order more for my new little one as well as a few girlfriends who are expecting. This is the perfect gift to give an expecting mother at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes but the quality was just sad. It ripped about month in and I was seriously dissapointed I loved all the prospects and versatility of use. It's just to thin and rips easy.
customer_reviews.author: David and Kay-Marie Stanger

customer_reviews.title: Best Product I Purchased for Baby
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily! Mostly for a nursing wrap. With my other 2 children, I had wraps that covered only the front. They constantly would kick or grab the sides and leave me exposed. Since this wraps all around, there is no worries. Also, I love the versatility. It's the one product you need and then your diaper bag won't be loaded down with a million other useless products. Also, love the stripe pattern and it matches my diaper bag perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a perfect carseat cover
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect carseat cover. My son was born at the beginning of summer and this was a perfect light fabric to put over his carseat. I used it as a nursing cover and it worked well when I wanted to be covered. I have even used it as a blanket if I forget one for my son. It is light but still warm. My only complaint is that it got a few holes in it since it is a lighter fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic cover, and I also wear it as an ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cover, and I also wear it as an infinity scarf. I feel confident being able to use it in public and maintaining some semblance of modesty in busy places. Also, use it at home when we have company, etc. Stretchy and soft. Very glad I bought this. Great shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: CuriousAmy

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of how versatile this is
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of how versatile this is, since I am not a fan of toting around multiple things when one will do the trick for various purposes. The fabric is nice, very stretchy and not see-through when you put it on as a nursing cover. I love that it's a simple stripe pattern - it goes really well with my existing wardrobe, and mix and matches well with anything I have to wear.
customer_reviews.author: kirsty220

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat cover
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with copper pearl. The best material. I love the pattern. The colors were spot on. I wash it separate on cold gentle cycle and hung to dry. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melani

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this cover more than others.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect car seat and nursing cover. My son is only a few months old so we haven't tried using it for a high chair and shopping cart cover. However, I am so glad I bought this cover. We use it every day to the cover the car seat and to keep the wind from getting to my son. He was a January baby. I like this one better than the ones that cover his face. I like being able to just look through the top of it to check on him and see if he's awake or sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use primarily as an infant car seat cover. Quality and versatility is great. My one complaint is that it is very ill fitting on my car seat, which is a very standard Graco infant car seat. I've tried everything and it does not fit as pictured. The cover is almost too big looking and doesn't look as nice as it looks like it does on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: VeeRich

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny (and it's not expensive!)
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a multi use nursing/cart/car seat cover. After looking at many different brands, I went with this one based on reviews. It's AMAZING! I used it for the first time on the plane last weekend and it's so breathable and comfortable to nurse. I do not care to show anything if i have to nurse in public (I want to be completely covered and as discrete as possible) and this was the best solution! Seriously, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cook

customer_reviews.title: Best nursing cover!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I have two!! I use it as a blanket on her sometimes when we are out as well as the car seat cover and nursing cover! I always get compliments on the cute pattern as well! Love that it cover me all the way around and makes nursing in public very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: TylerH

customer_reviews.title: Functional AND pretty nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second nursing cover and I like it way better than my other one (an infinity-style scarf nursing cover) already! It has the perfect amount of stretch and it doesn't slip off your body or expose you because of the way the neck hole is designed. I like the design and the material is super soft. I haven't used it as a car seat cover or high chair cover yet, but I think it will be useful for both in addition to covering myself while nursing or pumping in my car!
customer_reviews.author: KC TQ OD

customer_reviews.title: Love it-highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love it-highly recommend...without a cover over the babe people tend to want to touch his precious face despite my dirty glares. The cover keeps him cozy and protected and allows me to run errands without worrying about exposure. The face it doubles as a nursing cover is a huge plus! I'd recommend it strictly as a car seat cover alone. Well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and stretchy, but too thin
customer_reviews.text: While I loved the idea of this car seat canopy and nursing cover, the fabric was just too thin. It was see-through to be a canopy and allowed too much light through. It did not fit snugly enough to work well for a canopy, but the softness and stretch was great for breastfeeding (twins)! Perhaps other colors would be more opaque?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: Great multifunction cover
customer_reviews.text: This is beautifully made, soft and fashionable. I love that it won't blow around in wind like my other car seat cover. Also this is the best nursing cover because it covers the most while still allowing me to see baby. She doesn't like when my cover touches her face while nursing and this won't!
customer_reviews.author: YogaNut

customer_reviews.title: Functional and fashionable.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! The fabric is stretchy, soft, and breathable. I am using it as a car seat cover. I love that it doesn't blow open with the wind like other car seat canopies. The pattern matches my diaper bag. I definitely recommend this for the warmer months. Fast shipping and wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TxMomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, easy to use and super discreet
customer_reviews.text: Looks good & easy to use. I use as a carseat cover and it's perfect to keep the sun out and the hole on top is nice to let the AC in the carseat a bit. I used as a nursing cover at a baseball game and 2 people asked where the baby was as he was nursing. They didn't even notice. They said it looked like my shirt. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I've purchased a similar product from another brand but I like this one better, it fits better when I'm nursing so I'm hoping to purchase another in the future. I haven't had it long and im already getting compliments on it. It's very comfortable and is made of good quality fabric. So far I've used as a nursing cover and car seat cover. Oh, and the price is definitely fair. I don't have any complaints
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Fancher

customer_reviews.title: great buy, great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover and it was such a great price. All the other covers I looked at were $40 and up. We used this cover today and it was light, stretchy yet durable. We live near the beach where the weather is usually pretty warm but I like to have my son covered from the elements. I would absolutely recommend this cover to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: momma3

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of the multipurpose canopy
customer_reviews.text: Extrrmely fast shipping. Very stretchy and soft. I am washing it now, so I will see how it does after a washing. I like the idea of the multipurpose canopy, cart cover, and nursing cover. It is easy to pack. If I had to find a con, it seems very thin but that is probably going to be a good thing for nursing.
customer_reviews.author: Melany C.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile cover
customer_reviews.text: Although we've only had this product a couple of days it's already proved very useful! We've used it on the stroller to keep him (our newborn) protected from the sun and from public hands that want to touch him. It also worked well on our small bouncy seat while we were outside to keep the sun from hitting him directly. I believe we'll be able to use this product a good bit and I'm grateful I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry Farms

customer_reviews.title: Super soft material and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my child’s car seat everywhere we go! Easy to use and blocks the sun and wind. Also super soft material and I purchased the matching swaddle and headband.
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: Genius! Best Car Seat Cover!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had something like this with my previous kids. This is awesome! The best car seat cover. Great coverage with the ability to peek in the top without lifting the entire cover like other car seat covers. Love that it doubles as a nursing cover. I will be buying another one to use just for grocery carts.
customer_reviews.author: You can call me AL

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I only use this as a car seat cover since I don’t cover myself while nursing. But it’s amazing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kareena

customer_reviews.title: Love it and wished I had known about it for my previous children
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a trip to Disneyland so I could be covered well while I nursed. I absolutely love it and wish I had had it with my previous children. It's so much easier than a blanket because you don't have to worry about the wind blowing or what's showing in back. Was perfect for nursing modestly on the plane. And just recently began using it on the carseat as I bring my baby in and out of stores so the wind/sun doesn't startle her awake. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trost

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cover is exactly what I expected it's stylish and functional. I use it as both a car seat cover and nursing cover (so much better than a traditional nursing cover). The company reached out to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase and answered any question I had quickly. Will definetly be purchasing these in the future as gifts for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard Pass!
customer_reviews.text: Colors not even close to the picture. More like brown instead of red. Very unattractive!
customer_reviews.author: Schmidt-Roark

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The way this thing is cut makes all the difference as a nursing cover. One end is narrower than the other and that makes for great coverage and "peakability." I have a very similar item that I love from another company, but this one was $10 less, so I gave it a shot. This one isn't quite as soft as the other, but for the price difference, I'd recommend going with the Copper Pearl cover.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyMommy

customer_reviews.title: I love EVERYTHING about this!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this cover! You can carry 1 piece instead of 3 separate pieces! You normally would have a cart cover, a nursing cover, and car seat cover. This is a thin stretchy material that doesn't take up much space in your diaper bag. I bought this as a gift and am ordering another to keep for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Levitan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Breathable and looks great. Not sure it's worth the $25 because it can be easily made. However, if you're looking for convenience then this is worth it. Fabric is stretchy and the 3 features are pretty cool. I would suggest the company to add more colors and patterns. Seems limited right now.
customer_reviews.author: MS014

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have seen similar stretchy covers from other brands but they are nothing compared to this Copper Pearl brand. I absolutely love the quality of this product. The fabric is thick and stretchy, but not like a hole is going to pop up any second like other stretchy fabrics I've worked with. I love that they found a medium between not too thin of fabric but it also isn't too hot. No one wants to get extra hot while nursing And this feels breezy when on. I also use it as a car seat cover and love that I don't have fabric flapping around and that I can still dangle a toy from the top handle.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: This fits nicely over the car seat although my baby seemed to feel claustrophobic when it was on. It's mid weight so it doesn't block out the sunlight, plus the hole clearly lets it in. But, I like it! It's the perfect amount of stretch and I am hoping to try using it for nursing in public soon.
customer_reviews.author: corky4

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these adorable, multi-purpose covers. They’re extremely stretchy and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Shianne M

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased.  Great for summer.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Fits on the Keyfit without any problems. I would imagine it would fit on any carseat based on the design. Keeps the sun off of the baby but doesn't make it too hot inside the seat. Great for hot climates. It folds up small to put in a backpack or diaper bag easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit hot for breastfeeding but still love and recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the print and the fabric. It fits the carseat perfectly. Only down side is baby girl gets a bit hot while breastfeeding otherwise overall great product and would highly recommend and might get a second one incase it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Soft and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to actually use this yet as our new guy is still cooking, but I tried it out how I will wear it for nursing-which was my number 1 reason for purchasing it. It is super light weight and stretchy leaving plenty of room for baby to nurse. I also think it will be very breathable during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: jockmomma

customer_reviews.title: BEST COVER EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing cover ever! I love the way the way it fits my carseat! It is also the most perfect nursing cover! It covers my back and front! It doesn't blow around in the wind. And it keeps a "personal bubble" around your baby so people don't reach in! I am totally going to buy this agin!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was not asked to write this review, I simply love this product so much I wanted to share! I use this mainly for a nursing cover and it works Great! It's soft, light, and VERY stretchy which is very useful to me. If I need to move baby to the other side I can keep cover on and do this without exposing myself. It covers me up all the way without exposing my back as well....I can nurse in public comfortably without people staring at me.
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: Soft, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these multi-use covers as mainly carseat covers. My girls haven't arrived yet so I haven't had a chance to try them on outings. But the fabric is soft, colors great and seams are high quality. They fit our Graco snapfit/snugride car seats perfectly and I could see using these for a variety of other uses, as well. Like lightweight blankets, the shopping cart covers as advertised. I purchased both the black and white and pink and white striped covers and love them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful car seat cover!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! Baby is 7 months old but still using the car seat carrier and I love this for covering her during the cold winter months. She already has this little sleeping bag type of liner that we use to keep her warm. I wanted something that would shield her from the wind but not roast her, this is perfect. I considered getting a Milk Snob but couldn't justify the price tag. This sweet little product works exactly how I hoped it would, is cute and stylish, and was in the right price range. If you are on the fence, I say go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has absolutely LOVED this cover. It has doubled as a carseat cover and nursing cover, and has worked excellently for both. The material is light and stretchy, but pretty durable (she's been using it pretty consistently for the four months or so). I definitely recommend this cover for both car seats and nursing (we haven't used it in a shopping cart, so cannot comment on that).
customer_reviews.author: Lance Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Other uses besides breastfeeding!
customer_reviews.text: It's super soft! I had used other covers while breast feeding before and switched to bottle feeding a couple months ago. I wish I had this th! I got this to help shade my daughter (6months) when she is in her carrier and to use as a high chair cover and cart cover. My daughter loves it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney forquell

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!!! Said my husband.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp!!! Is what my husband said about it. I hadn't been able to use it yet because I hadn't had a reason to go out with my newborn but today he had his two week appointment & my husband really liked it. He said it's not like those "fuzzy ones", you see everyone else have. I felt so proud about my purchase. My only suggestion is that there were other choice for colors, for example solid colors. Other than that, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this carseat/nursing cover. The color is pinky/peach and perfect for a girl. The fabric is lightweight and stretchy and covers my Chicco Key Fit easily. Love that it's multi use! Not hot and heavy like other nursing covers. Very comfortable and fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, but cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this, but it's cheaply made. I've only had it a few weeks and I don't get out much so I haven't over stretched it and there are already multiple little holes in the fabric. Love this idea but will be buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived nicely packaged and seems it will serve its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived nicely packaged and seems it will serve its purpose well. One thing I would've liked to to know beforehand is that the item is black/ivory or creamy white stripes, not black and pure white.
customer_reviews.author: seamama

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is thinner/ more lightweight than I thought and really good quality. One of the openings is bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several of these and wasn't quite sure what to expect. The fabric is thinner/ more lightweight than I thought and really good quality. One of the openings is bigger than the other, and once I tried it on, and l put it on the car seat, I saw the brilliance in the design. I love multi-use, good quality items, this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Great No-Fuss Nursing Cover
customer_reviews.text: The material is thin and light weight so I don't worry about my baby getting too stuffy inside. I love not having to worry about the sides or behind me when I am feeling my baby or having her rip the cover right off us both. The ivory stripes are slightly see through if you put your hand up and stretch it taught just in case you don't want that, now you know to get a solid or darkly patterned cover. Very pleased over all with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases ever made for our little man
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases ever made for our little man. I use it as a breastfeeding cover, a car seat cover and sometimes a little blanket because it's so soft. It keeps shade and warmth in! It's seriously the best thing, i cannot leave the house without it. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Kayton

product_meta.title: Baby Car Seat Cover Canopy and Nursing Cover Multi-Use Stretchy 5 in 1 Gift"The Classic" by Copper Pearl
product_meta.description: Color:ClassicCopper Pearl multi-use 5-in-1 cover can be used as a car seat cover, nursing cover, shopping cart cover, high chair cover, and infinity scarf. This versatile cover is made of a high quality, stretchy, brush stroke pattern rayon blend fabric. The unisex, modern, and trendy fabric offers your baby protection from the elements such as wind, rain, snow, and bright light. It is quick and easy to put on and take off but snug enough that your little one can’t kick it off while nursing. The cover is warm enough for the cold winter months and lightweight enough for the hot summer months. As a nursing cover, it provides full and adequate coverage for worry-free nursing. You no longer have to be nervous about nursing in public or wherever you are. The stretchy fabric also allows you to easily access to your newborn while breastfeeding, to ensure a good latch or for any other adjustments. While you are shopping, this cover protects your little one from germ infested shopping carts, providing a great alternative to using wipes every time you go to the store. One size fits almost all models of car seats, shopping carts, and nursing mothers. Compact when folded, the cover conveniently takes up little storage space in your diaper bag or purse. This nursing cover / car seat cover makes a perfect Christmas present or baby shower gift for new moms.
feature_bullets: 5-in-1 Cover. Baby Car Seat Cover. Nursing Cover. Shopping Cart Cover. High Chair Cover. Infinity Scarf. Stretchy fabric fits most car seats, shopping carts, nursing mothers, and high chairs.
Covers are made for all season use and provide protection against the elements. Great for both nursing and as a car seat cover.
High quality, modern, and trendy fabric is a rayon blend and folds compactly for easy storage.
Easy to use, easy to put on and take off of your car seat, easy to see and access your baby while nursing / breastfeeding
Every new mom will want one of these nursing covers / car seat covers as a baby shower gift!

specifications.Safety warning: NOTE: Do not clip the cover between the car seat and the car seat base as this may affect the proper attachment of the car seat or cause holes in the cover.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,210 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
